original_text: He took the blind man by the hand and led him outside the village. When he had spit on the man’s eyes and put his hands on him, Jesus asked, “Do you see anything?”
korean_text: 예수께서 맹인의 손을 붙잡으시고 마을 밖으로 데리고 나가사 눈에 침을 뱉으시며 그에게 안수하시고 무엇이 보이느냐 물으시니

sentences.original_text: He took the blind man by the hand
and led him outside the village
When he had spit on the man's eyes
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그 사람의 눈에 침을 뱉었을 때

sentences.original_text: and put his hands on him
